I <S%G1473><s%> was <S%G2252><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> of Joppa <S%G2445><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a trance <S%G1611><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> a vision <S%G3705><s%>, a certain <S%G5100><s%> vessel <S%G4632><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%>, as it were <S%G5613><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> sheet <S%G3607><s%> let down <S%G2524><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> by four <S%G5064><s%> corners <S%G746><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> it came <S%G2064><s%> even unto <S%G891><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>:

upon <S%G1519><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> when I had fastened mine eyes <S%G816><s%>, I considered <S%G2657><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> the fourfooted beasts <S%G5074><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wild beasts <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> creeping things <S%G2062><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> birds <S%G4071><s%> of the heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%>, Not so <S%G3365><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> nothing <S%G3956><s%> common <S%G2839><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> hath ever <S%G3763><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, forthwith <S%G1824><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> men <S%G435><s%> stood before <S%G2186><s%> the <S%G1909><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we were <S%G1510><s%>, having been sent <S%G649><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Caesarea <S%G2542><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> accompanied2064, 4862 me <S%G1698><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> we entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the man <S%G435><s%>'s house <S%G3624><s%>:

and <S%G5037><s%> he told <S%G518><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> he had seen <S%G1492><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G2036><s%>, <S%G846><s%> Send649, 435 to <S%G1519><s%> Joppa <S%G2445><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fetch <S%G3343><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%>, whose surname is <S%G1941><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> shall speak <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> words <S%G1722><s%>, whereby <S%G3739><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> shalt be saved <S%G4982><s%>, thou and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3415><s%> remembered the word <S%G4487><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, how he <S%G5613><s%> said <S%G3004><s%>, John <S%G2491><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> with water <S%G5204><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> shall be baptized <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> then3767, 5613 God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> the like <S%G2470><s%> gift <S%G1431><s%> as <S%G2532><s%> he did also unto us <S%G2254><s%>, when we believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G1161><s%>, who <S%G5101><s%> was <S%G2252><s%> I <S%G1473><s%>, that I could <S%G1415><s%> withstand <S%G2967><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>?

And when <S%G1161><s%> they heard <S%G191><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, they held their peace <S%G2270><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Then <S%G686><s%> to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> hath <S%G1325><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> granted <S%G1325><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

They therefore3767, Ezekiel3 that were scattered abroad <S%G1289><s%> upon <S%G575><s%> the tribulation <S%G2347><s%> that arose <S%G1096><s%> about <S%G1909><s%> Stephen <S%G4736><s%> travelled <S%G1330><s%> as far as <S%G2193><s%> Phoenicia <S%G5403><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Cyprus <S%G2954><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>, speaking <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> to none <S%G3367><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> to Jews <S%G2453><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the report <S%G3056><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> them <S%G846><s%> came <S%G191><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the ears <S%G3775><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> which was <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they sent forth <S%G1821><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> as <S%G2193><s%> far as <S%G2193><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>:

who <S%G3739><s%>, when he was come <S%G3854><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> had seen <S%G1492><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, was glad <S%G5463><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he exhorted <S%G3870><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%>, that with purpose <S%G4286><s%> of heart <S%G2588><s%> they would cleave <S%G4357><s%> unto the Lord <S%G2962><s%>:

for <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> a good <S%G18><s%> man <S%G435><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> was added <S%G4369><s%> unto the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G921><s%> went forth <S%G1831><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Tarsus <S%G5019><s%> to seek <S%G327><s%> for Saul <S%G4569><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> when he had found <S%G2147><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, he brought <S%G71><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, that even for a whole <S%G3650><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> they were gathered <S%G4863><s%> together <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> people <S%G3793><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> that the disciples <S%G3101><s%> were called <S%G5537><s%> Christians <S%G5546><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> there stood up <S%G450><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Agabus <S%G13><s%>, and signified <S%G4591><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> that there should <S%G3195><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> a <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%>: which <S%G3748><s%> came to pass <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the days of <S%G2541><s%> Claudius <S%G2804><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%>, every <S%G1538><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> according to <S%G2531><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ability <S%G2141><s%>, determined <S%G3724><s%> to send <S%G3992><s%> relief <S%G1248><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> dwelt <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%>:

which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> they did <S%G4160><s%>, sending it <S%G649><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the hand <S%G5495><s%> of Barnabas <S%G921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Saul <S%G4569><s%>.
